Articles.Content:
yeah just asking around if anyone has had their ships starting sideways on the launchpad or tilting and falling over just after start.

im kinda stumped here and wondering if i did something wrong here.
It may be caused by an asymmetrical design. It may also be the top being so heavy that when it wobbles on the launch pad, it just topples over.
i dont even get ON the pad essentially...
It\'d help to see an image of your ship, or the .craft file. Most likely, it\'s wobbling around enough to tip over. This means you need to either add struts, or make the base more symmetrical.
